department.dept_long_name: Committee on Higher Degrees in Biological Sciences in Public Health

course.title: Pathophysiology of Human Disease
course.description: Surveys major human disease problems in the cardiovascular, respiratory, hematopoietic, reproductive, and gastrointestinal systems. Emphasis on understanding the pathophysiologic basis of common disease manifestations and the pathogenesis of the disease process.
course.notes: Offered jointly with the Medical School as BPH 729.0 and with the School of Public Health as EH 208.
